614270.name: Fantasy Grounds - BASIC02: A Frightful Time (5E)
614270.description:
Calling all Beginner 5E DMs and Players!

A 5th Edition compatible adventure for beginner players and game masters
Part of a series of seasonally thematic modules, this adventure can be run to completion in 3-6 hours
Fall into heroism!
The young heroes from Exallizar Preparatory Academy are back for their second adventure and this time, theres no safety net.
A nearby town has sent out a call for aid after a mad hermit has promised to spread untold misery during their yearly harvest celebration. Your group has been selected by the administration to answer that call, and act as representatives for the entire school!
You dare not fail.
A Frightful Time includes:
  • The second leg of the adventure started in BASIC-1
  • A new breed of monster that is sure to be an instant seasonal classic
  • A grading system to let you know how well youve done at the end of the adventure
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
